name: Urban Loft Berlin
description: Well set in the centre of Berlin, URBAN LOFT Berlin provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. The property is allergy-free and is located 1 km from Berlin Central Station. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at URBAN LOFT Berlin also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At URBAN LOFT Berlin you will find a restaurant serving Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Languages spoken at the reception include German and English. Natural History Museum is 1.4 km from URBAN LOFT Berlin, while Memorial of the Berlin Wall is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: sly Berlin
description: No description found

name: Precise Tale Berlin Potsdamer Platz
description: Precise Tale Berlin Potsdamer Platz features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Berlin. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 500 metres from Topography of Terror, 500 metres from Potsdamer Platz and less than 1 km from Checkpoint Charlie. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Berliner Philharmonie. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Precise Tale Berlin Potsdamer Platz can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking German, English and Hebrew at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Holocaust Memorial, Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 25 km from Precise Tale Berlin Potsdamer Platz.

name: Vienna House Easy By Wyndham Berlin Potsdamer Platz
description: No description found

name: Telegraphenamt
description: In Berlin (Mitte) With a stay at Telegraphenamt, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, within a 5-minute drive of Alexanderplatz and Brandenburg Gate. This hotel is 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from Berlin TV Tower and 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Checkpoint Charlie. Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Oranienburger Strasse - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi Bode Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Museum Island - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Hackescher Markt - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Humboldt University - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi Friedrichstadt-Palast - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Friedrichstrasse - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Torstrasse - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Admiralspalast - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi DDR Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Hackesche Höfe - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Pergamonmuseum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Sealife Berlin - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Berlin Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi German Historical Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi The nearest major airport is Berlin (BER-Brandenburg) - 28.4 km / 17.6 mi Enjoy a satisfying meal at ROOT serving guests of Telegraphenamt. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM and on weekends from 7:30 AM to noon for a fee. Make yourself at home in one of the 97 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers.Ticket Package

name: Loginn Hotel Berlin Airport
description: Located in Berlin and with East Side Gallery reachable within 19 km, LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 21 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 21 km from Gendarmenmarkt and 21 km from Alexanderplatz. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Guest rooms at LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport are equipped with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. Berlin Cathedral is 21 km from LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport, while Berlin TV Tower is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: H10 Ku'damm Lofts
description: Situated in Berlin, 600 metres from Kurfürstendamm and 2.7 km from Berliner Philharmonie, H10 Ku'damm Lofts features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a bar and a terrace. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-fitted kitchenette with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available each morning at the aparthotel. A bicycle rental service is available at H10 Ku'damm Lofts. Potsdamer Platz is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Airport, 20 km from H10 Ku'damm Lofts.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: This 4-star-superior hotel offers 3 restaurants, a spa and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. It is Berlin's tallest hotel and is located directly on Alexanderplatz Square. All rooms and suites at the Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz have marble bathrooms with power showers and heated floors. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel. Meals and drinks are available in the Spagos Bar&Lounge, prepared before your eyes in the open kitchen. The Park Inn’s wellness centre includes a sauna, gym and massages. Guests can also relax on the top-floor terrace, which offers great views of central Berlin. The Park Inn by Radisson stands opposite Alexanderplatz Station, which offers bus, tram, underground and S-Bahn rail links to all parts of Berlin. Museum Island and the lively Hackescher Markt area are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Berlin, Berlin
description: This hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a stylish lounge-bar and modern rooms with a flat-screen TV. The famous KaDeWe department store is a 5-minute walk away. Decorated in warm colour schemes, every room at the Hotel Berlin, Berlin comes equipped with air conditioning and a fridge. Leisure facilities at the Hotel Berlin, Berlin include a modern gym, Finnish sauna and a sanarium. Guests can also rent bicycles at the 24-hour front desk. The popular Kurfürstendamm shopping street and Berlin Zoo are just a 5-minute underground ride away.

name: Scandic Berlin Kurfürstendamm
description: Scandic Berlin Kurfuerstendamm is a comfortable base while visiting Berlin and is close to everything the area has to offer. It features a sauna, a rooftop terrace and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests of the hotel can enjoy a range of relaxation facilities at Sauna, which features a Turkish steam bath. For an easy and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and ironing facilities. The hotel is close to Wittenbergplatz Berlin Underground Station, making it easy for guests to explore Berlin and its surrounding areas. Guests can also easily visit Theater des Westens, Kurfurstendamm and Berlin Zoological Garden.Revato

name: Intercontinental Berlin
description: The upscale InterContinental® Berlin hotel sits next to leafy Tiergarten Park, a pleasant walk from the iconic Brandenburg Gate. Choose an elegant room or spacious suite, swim in the inviting indoor pool and indulge in a treatment at SPA InterContinental. After work, sip cocktails in the renovated Marlene Bar and experience gourmet dining in a Michelin star awarded 14th-floor restaurant with panoramic city views.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Vienna House Andel's Berlin
description: Offering a bar with panoramic views of Berlin, a Michelin-star awarded restaurant, a spa with 24-hour gym, and stylish rooms, this 4-star-superior hotel is just 6 tram stops from Alexanderplatz Square. Located opposite the Landsberger Allee tram stop, the environmentally-friendly Vienna House by Wyndham Andel's Berlin has air-conditioned, non-smoking rooms with a flat-screen TV, laptop safe, and large bathroom. Free WiFi is available here. The SpaSphere is the 550 m² spa area comprising a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, a hot tub, fitness studio and relaxation terraces. Guests can enjoy natural plants and attentive spa treatments in a soundproofed area free of traffic noise. In the evenings, The star restaurant Skykitchen takes you into a magical world of flavors of French, Asian and regional cuisine. Enjoy your culinary journey of the extra class with an excellent wine accompaniment, and the multiple award-winning service above the rooftops of Berlin. Landsberger Allee City Rail Station is 50 metres from the Vienna House by Wyndham Andel's Berlin. Trains run to Schönefeld Airport in 30 minutes.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Berlin Ku'damm
description: Overlooking Los Angeles Plaza, our hotel is less than five minutes' walk of the luxury boutiques, restaurants, and showrooms of Kurfurstendamm. Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and Berlin Zoological Garden are also within walking distance. Just 15 minutes from the city center, our 11 meeting rooms offer flexible event space for up to 500 guests.Hilton

name: Hotel Palace Berlin
description: This hotel offers a free pool with hot tub, modern fitness centre and spa. It is located opposite Berlin Zoo, a 4-minute walk from the Gedächtniskirche Church and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. The famous KaDeWe department store is just 700 m away. All soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Palace Berlin feature classically modern décor, and free WiFi in all areas and rooms. Breakfast is served daily at Bon Dia. beef 45 is a restaurant specializing in meat. Guests at the Hotel Palace can relax in the Lobby Lounge cafe and bar. The Palace Berlin's spa offers its guests massage services and personal trainers. Rental bicycles are also available for a surcharge. Zoologischer Garten Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Palace Berlin. It provides direct connections to Schönefeld Airport and Tegel Airport.

name: Hilton Berlin
description: Hilton Berlin, located in the center of the city and only a short drive from the main airports, is also on historic Gendarmenmarkt and within walking distance of attractions such as the Berlin Wall, Brandenburg Gate, Humboldt Forum, Checkpoint Charlie and the Reichstag. Discover excellent shopping at Mall of Berlin and Friedrichsstrasse, only steps away. Hilton Berlin is the perfect location to discover the rich culture and entertainment landscape of this metropolitan city. The hotel provides 601 beautifully furnished guest rooms including 29 individually designed executive suites. All suites overlook the Gendarmenmarkt and come with access to the Executive Lounge. The spacious 360 square meter Executive Lounge offers complimentary breakfast and free WiFi. Additional on-property restaurants are breakfast restaurant Beletage and Listo, featuring regional and international specialties. Listo also serves freshly brewed coffee, tasty pastries and selected wines and spirits. Unwind in the 800 square meter wellness and fitness center featuring a heated indoor pool, massage center and air conditioned 24-hour gym.Hilton

name: Hotel Spree-idyll
description: This 3-star hotel is part of the Wassersportzentrum Berlin water sports centre, located directly beside the River Spree. Free WiFi and a sauna with fitness room for a surcharge are offered here, and boats can be rented nearby. The non-smoking Hotel Spree-idyll has spacious rooms and minibar. Rooms in the second hotel building feature a balcony. Guests at the Spree Idyll are welcome to use the Wassersportzentrum’s gym and sauna area. The spacious terrace invites guests to enjoy the sun. Bikes can be stored in the bicycle room free of charge. Full buffet breakfasts are prepared at the Spree Idyll Hotel in the mornings. Parking is free at the Spree Idyll. Drivers are only 5 minutes from the Old Town district of Köpenick and 10 minutes from the Kindl-Bühne Wuhlheide concert venue. Berlin city centre is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz
description: Right in the heart of the city, surrounded by famous attractions, you’ll find the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz hotel. With the nearest train station just a 5 minute walk from our hotel, it’s easy to see the sights. Spend a night on the town in the entertainment district. Experience panoramic views of the city at the TV Tower and discover Berlin’s vibrant nightlife in various bars and restaurants. Shuttle service is available by reservation. Each day of your stay in Alexanderplatz is off to a great start with our hot breakfast included in your stay, featuring all your favorites including eggs, beans, waffles, fruit and more. Stop by the 24/7 Hub when you have a late night craving. Unwind in a spacious room with a 40-inch HDTV, free WiFi and an inviting armchair with ottoman. Rest peacefully on a clean and comfy bed. Make tea and coffee right in your own room. Ask our friendly team about connecting rooms and accessible room options.Hilton

name: Hotel Luc, Autograph Collection
description: It continues an intrinsic heritage of acceptance, generosity and can-dor that does justice to Berlin's most beautiful city square. Our 5 star boutique hotel is conveniently located in Friedrichstadt, Berlin and offers guests a glimpse into the elegant, deep-blue world of Prussia's legacy. 75 restful rooms and 17 exclusive suites offer a balance of formality and a sense of freedom. The strategically chosen location opposite the French Dom showcases the grandeur of Berlin, while the architectural ensemble of the Konzerthaus and the Deutscher Dom across the square serve as a reminder of Prussian religious tolerance and humility. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.This candor flows throughout the entire hotel, inspiring the interior design, the gastronomy, and the overall philosophy. With this approach in mind, the Hotel Luc reinvents a contemporary Prussian way of life with local ease.Marriott

name: Adelante Boutique Hotel
description: Elegant Boutiquehotel in Berlin's Mitte district just a 5-minute walk from the Friedrichstraße shopping mile. It offers spacious rooms with design furniture, dimmable lighting, free Wi-Fi, Smart-TVs and a sound system with Bluetooth receiver. All rooms at the ADELANTE Boutique Hotel feature air conditioning and bathroom under floor heating. All the modern bathrooms are fitted with a rain shower. A 24-hour fitness room is also available on-site. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the LOUNGE and courtyard terrace and guests can also enjoy coffee, tea, drinks and snacks during day and evening. The ADELANTE Boutique Hotel is a short walk from the lively Hackescher Markt district and the Friedrichstadt-palast Theatre. The ADELANTE Boutique Hotel offers easy access to Berlin's main sights via public transport. It is a 5-minute walk from Oranienburger Straße Underground Station and Nordbahnhof S-Bahn (city rail) Station. This hotel offers on-site public parking spaces based on availability.

name: Hotel Indigo Berlin - East Side Gallery
description: Hotel Indigo® Berlin - East Side Gallery stands in a neighbourhood that wears its heart on its sleeve. Located next to the Mercedes-Benz Arena, facing the East Side Gallery in the district of Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg. We're 20 kilometres from Berlin Airport (BER) and 12 kilometres from the motorway exit, Pankow. Warschauer Strasse and Ostbahnhof railway station are a kilometre away, with frequent trains to Berlin City Centre and Berlin Airport. Urban delights are just around the corner, with local shops, flea and food markets, hip and ruff bars, and the RAW space. All major attractions of the city can be reached within a couple of minutes, either by public transport, boat, or walking. You can workout in the hotel's gym. Enjoy lunch and dinner at the Restaurant Spreewirtschaft, and relax with a drink or light bite to eat at the Gallery Rooftop Bar with a stunning view over the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Maritim Proarte Hotel Berlin
description: This hotel in central Berlin offers elegant rooms and a spa area with an indoor pool. It is located on Friedrichstrasse shopping street, 300 metres from the underground station. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites of the Maritim proArte Hotel Berlin feature Italian-style furnishings, satellite TV and a laptop safe. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in the whole hotel. International cuisine as well as typical Berlin food is served in the hotel’s 2 restaurants in a cosy atmosphere. The Checkpoint bar offers an exquisite choice of cocktails, long drinks, high quality spirits as well as burgers, snacks and nibbles. The Maritim’s spa area includes a swimming pool, sauna, steam room and fitness room. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The famous Unter den Linden Boulevard featuring the Brandenburg Gate is just 100 metres away. The UNESCO Museum Island is only 1.5 km from the hotel. Other attractions within walking distance include the Friedrichstadt-Palast, Admiralspalast, Komische Oper, boat tours and Hackescher Markt.

name: NH Collection Berlin Mitte Friedrichstrasse
description: NH Collection Berlin Mitte Friedrichstrasse, formerly known as NH Collection Berlin Friedrichstrasse, is located in one of Berlin’s most premium locations. Nearby, guests will find the city’s top attractions, including Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie and the Unter den Linden boulevard. For access to the rest of the city, Friedrichstrasse metro is steps away. The 268 rooms at NH Collection Berlin Mitte Friedrichstrasse welcome guests with a warm contemporary design. Each is outfitted with a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV and a professional hairdryer, to make guests feel at home. Suites come with separate sitting rooms and dining areas. In the mornings, enjoy a lavish breakfast, with our specialty pancakes and waffles, accompanied by freshly brewed coffee or tea. This is served in a wonderful breakfast room with natural light, high ceilings and bright modern design. The TASTE! Bar and Restaurant offers a varied selection of mouthwatering dishes, from elevated street-food to haute cuisine. To relax and invigorate your body, head to the plunge pool and sauna. Meanwhile, for business meetings, the hotel has 10 function rooms accommodating up to 320 people.NH Hoteles

name: Riu Plaza Berlin
description: This hotel is set in a modern 17-storey building on Berlin's Kurfürstendamm boulevard. The RIU Plaza Berlin is a 5-minute walk from Kurfürstendamm Underground Station and the world-famous KaDeWe department store. All rooms and suites at the Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm feature luxury furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe, fridge, air conditioning and a private bathroom. High-speed WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in all areas of the hotel. Use of the hotel fitness room is also complimentary. The Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm also boasts a 24-hour reception and extensive conference facilities. The hotel's own restaurant serves a varied breakfast buffet, as well as lunch and dinner à la carte. The Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm is 3 km from the Brandenburg Gate, 10 km from Tegel Airport and 22 km from Schönefeld Airport.

name: Orania.Berlin
description: Located in an historic building famous for hosting artists, Orania.Berlin dates back to 1913 and features a cultural as well as historical legacy. The hotel is located in the Kreuzberg district of Berlin, famous for its diverse cultural and art scene. All rooms at Orania.Berlin feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, a coffee machine, luxury toiletries from local sources, bathrobes, a complimentary bottle of water slippers and designer furnishings. The private bathrooms all include a rain shower, while most also include a bathtub. Some rooms also feature stunning views of Oranienplatz. Guests can indulge at the on-site restaurant, which features innovative cuisine with local ingredients or enjoy a drink at the bar, which serves artisan cocktails. Musical and cultural events are still hosted at the Orania.Berlin today, and a piano, stage and literary salon are featured on-site. Concerts are provided free of charge for guests. A 24-hour fitness centre is also available for guests and boasts a variety of state-of-the-art fitness equipment. Checkpoint Charlie is 2 km from Orania.Berlin, while Alexanderplatz is 2.1 km away. The Orania.Berlin is Greensign Level 4 certified.

name: Sana Berlin Hotel
description: Just 700 m from the KaDeWe department store on Berlin’s Kurfürstendamm, this stylish hotel offers soundproofed rooms, and dining in the Lobby Lounge, serving snacks and light meals throughout the day. The 4-star-superior SANA Berlin Hotel has modern, elegant rooms and self-catering apartments. They feature wooden floors, black-out curtains, and a laptop safe. Guests can work out in SANA’s gym. The lobby bar offer snacks and drinks. In warm weather, guests can enjoy drinks on the spacious terrace with sofas. Berlin Zoo and the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church are a 10-minute walk from the Hotel SANA Berlin. Augsburger Straße Underground Station is a 2-minute walk away. The hotel also offers bicycles and cars for hire.

name: Holiday Inn Berlin City Center East Prenzlauer Berg, An IHG Hotel
description: Family-friendly Prenzlauer Berg hotel with a bistro, bar and gymNear the city centre in cosmopolitan Prenzlauer Berg, Holiday Inn® Berlin City Centre East P-Berg hotel is close to fashionable shops, cafés and cultural venues.The M2 tram stops in front of the hotel, providing direct links to Alexanderplatz, both airports and the Messe Berlin exhibition grounds. It’s a short walk to the Prenzlauer Allee S-Bahn station, where trains whisk guests to city centre destinations such as the Brandenburg Gate and Berlin BER Airport (BER) in half an hour. Cultural draws within walking distance of the hotel include Max-Schmeling-Halle, with its programme of sports events, concerts and family-friendly shows, and the Kulturbrauerei, a converted brewery housing theatres, a cinema and bars. The MACHmit! Museum for Children offers craft workshops.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Inclusive Wi-Fi- A fitness centre- Kids stay and eat freeWake up to a generous buffet in our breakfast room, and enjoy a light lunch or dinner, including local specialities, in the casual lobby bistro. Business guests can hold a gathering of up to 70 in our 5 meeting rooms. A 24-hour bar enables you to order a nightcap as late as you like. Rooms have comfort-enhancing details such as pillow menus, and families can book accommodation with sofa beds and bathtubs.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Checkpoint Charlie
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Checkpoint Charlie is conveniently situated in the city centre and features a swimming pool and a sauna. This modern property is located in Berlin-Mitte. There are a range of facilities available to guests of Adina, including meeting rooms, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. The property also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. The apartments are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include a seating area, an in-room closet and a desk. Breakfast is served every day at Alto, specialising in international fare. Room service is also available during limited hours. Berlin's attractions, such as the Checkpoint Charlie and Gendarmenmarkt, are easily accessible on foot from Adina Apartment Hotel. Guests can also visit Friedrichstrasse, Humboldt University of Berlin and the Berlin State Opera.Revato

name: nhow Berlin
description: Located right on the bank of the Spree, the nhow Berlin is just a short distance from Berlin Tegel Airport and Berlin Central Station. The nhow Berlin has many nearby attractions. Guests will find that the Oberbaumbrücke, the Arena Badeschiff, and the Ratibortheater are all within walking distance. However, this hotel offers more than the usual in terms of in-house entertainment. Immerse yourself in art and music at our in-house concerts, exhibitions and fashion shows. Our freshly designed selection of 304 soundproof rooms offer guitar and keyboard room service, Ipod docking stations and flat screen TVs besides free Wi-Fi, minibars, Nespresso machines rain effect showers etc. Upgraded larger rooms feature connecting rooms, sitting areas, sofas, and a sofa bed. Cats and dogs are welcome to stay with their owners. A daily breakfast buffet is prepared for guests along with cooked-to-order hot dishes which are available upon request. For lunch and dinner, Restaurant Fabrics opens its doors and offers local and international cuisine. Our gym is equipped with a sauna and our spa offers guests a Finnish sauna, steam baths, and biosauna. For meetings and events, there are 12 function spaces with the biggest Spree terraces in Berlin.NH Hoteles

name: Kpm Hotel & Residences
description: Set within 2 km of Kurfürstendamm, KPM Hotel & Residences in Berlin has a number of amenities. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom, and some rooms have a balcony. A kitchenette is available upon request in all units at a surcharge. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Reichstag is 3.5 km from KPM Hotel & Residences. The nearest airport is BER Airport, 26.5 km from the accommodation.

name: pentahotel Berlin-Köpenick
description: Situated opposite Köpenick Castle in the Köpenick district of Berlin, this hotel offers free WiFi, stylish accommodation and great public transport links on the banks of the river Dahme. The HOTEL BERLIN KÖPENICK by Leonardo Hotels’s rooms are equipped with a range of modern amenities, such as satellite TV, air conditioning and free movie channels. During warmer months, you can enjoy breakfast and evening drinks by the water’s edge. Relax all year round in the hotel’s lounge, which offers great views of the river and the castle. Lunch and dinner are also served in the restaurant. During your stay in Köpenick, take some time to explore the Müggelsee lake, the Müggelberge hills and the historic castle. The hotel is just a short walk away from an S-Bahn (city rail) station, providing easy access to Berlin’s top attractions. These include the Alexanderplatz square and the Museum Island.

name: Catalonia Berlin Mitte
description: Catalonia Berlin Mitte is located in front of the Heinrich-Heine-Str. Underground Station, and within 15 minutes' walk from Berlin's main sights. It offers free WiFi in all areas, and a brand new gym and a small sauna. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Extras include a desk, safe and a minibar. Guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the Catalonia's cocktail bar or a meal in the Kunstwerk restaurant, which features a courtyard terrace. Breakfast is available each morning, and at the weekend can be enjoyed until 12:00. At Catalonia Berlin Mitte you will find a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge as well as an internet corner in the lobby with work tables. The hotel has a unique lifestyle charm and is decorated with graffiti by Berlin artists. The hotel is a 20 minutes' walk from Alexanderplatz Square and the historic Nikolaiviertel, and a 15 minutes' walk from Museum Island. Potsdamer Platz can be reached in 10 minutes via public transportation.

name: Gold Palais Hotel
description: Situated in Berlin and with Alexanderplatz Underground Station reachable within 1.4 km, Gold Palais Hotel features a fitness centre, allergy-free rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 1.3 km from Alexanderplatz, 3.3 km from Berlin Cathedral and 1.6 km from Berlin TV Tower. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all rooms at Gold Palais Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Speaking German and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. German Historical Museum is 3.5 km from Gold Palais Hotel, while Neues Museum is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: So/ Berlin Das Stue
description: The boutique hotel SO/Berlin Das Stue is located in the middle of the embassy district, in the immediate vicinity of the Berlin Zoo. It has a fixed view of the Tiergarten, the zoo and of the Berlin's western and eastern skyline. The listed building of the former Royal Danish Embassy was built in the late 1930s by KaDeWe architect Johann Emil Schaudt.accorhotels.com

name: Moxy Berlin Airport
description: Located within reach of terminal 1 & 2, Moxy Berlin Airport is the perfect place to rest after a long flight, or get ready before an early one. At this 236-room hotel, the modern traveler can find all the perks and none of the fuss they need when on the road, from furiously fast wi-fi to 24/7 Grab and Go, Moxy has got you covered. And a selection of signature cocktails, local craft beer, and finger licking foods make sure no matter what time you land in Berlin, there's something to satisfy any craving. Our cosy and smart rooms, with 42-inch TV with Chromecast, cushy platform beds and USB galore to power up your stay, are great to relax, work and sleep. And for those traveling with friends, even the furry ones, our family rooms offer plenty of space for everyone. Curious about Berlin's attractions. Take advantage of the furiously fast and free wi-fi, the city is just 40 minutes away by train with easy connections to Berlin Hauptbahnhof and Ostbahnhof.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Berlin Humboldthain Park
description: AC Hotel Berlin Humboldthain Park is an urban oasis. Located in the heart of Berlin, you will be able to explore the main landmarks of the city. AC knows exactly what you need, out intuitive design strikes the perfect balance, allowing you to maximise your enjoyment during your stay. You can expect flexible open spaces to experience signature moments.Marriott

name: Pestana Berlin Tiergarten
description: This 4-star-superior hotel is located in the green Tiergarten district, next to the Tiergarten park. Pestana Berlin Tiergarten offers light-flooded rooms with comfortable bedding, a spa with a heated indoor pool and free WiFi in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms of the Pestana Berlin Tiergarten feature natural wooden floorboards, large windows and a modern bathroom with rain shower and branded amenities. Guests also find a complimentary bottle of water in their room as well as a selection of top-quality cushions. Some rooms have a private terrace with panoramic views of the Tiergarten park and the Berlin skyline. The spa at the Pestana Berlin Tiergarten comes with a heated indoor pool, a sauna, a steam room and a fitness room. Massages can be booked. The neighbouring Tiergarten park is ideal for a walk, stroll or jog. The hotel's Atlantis Restaurant has a popular covered terrace and serves a small selection of classical dishes in a soft lighting atmosphere. Drinks and typical Berlin snacks can be enjoyed in the Aqua hotel bar. The Pestana is a 15-minute walk from Berlin Zoo, the KaDeWe Department Store and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Berlin’s famous number 200 sightseeing bus stops directly in front of the Pestana Tiergarten, offering a direct connection to Potsdamer Platz, the Brandenburg Gate, the historic Unter den Linden boulevard, Alexanderplatz and back to Zoologischer Garten train station.

name: Angleterre Hotel Berlin
description: Set in a prime location of Berlin, Angleterre Hotel Berlin puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Angleterre Hotel Berlin. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, sauna. Angleterre Hotel Berlin combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Berlin unforgettable.Agoda

name: Berlin Marriott Hotel
description: Indulge yourself with a lavish stay in Germany at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. The newly designed rooms of the Berlin Marriott Hotel offer a modern interpretation of the Bauhaus style right in the heart of the dynamic city of Berlin. Experience residential like comfortable guest rooms with novel platform beds as well as innovative technology in the Guest Entertainment System and amenities like energy-saving and particularly hygienic circulating air cooling units. Fuel up with delectable food and the finest of steaks from the Midtown Grill or enjoy delicious hot dogs and a variety of craft beers from The Big Dog. Explore downtown Berlin from our well situated hotel near Potsdamer Platz and Tiergarten park and discover the citys many merits. Our exceptional customizable event spaces and conference rooms are a perfect fit for your meeting or wedding needs. Let us make your stay unforgettable at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. Please note that our services may be limited due to government and hygiene restrictions.Marriott

name: Lindner Hotel Am Ku'damm
description: Centrally located on the Kurfürstendamm shopping street, this stylish 4-star hotel in Berlin offers soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and free internet. Each spacious room at the Lindner Hotel AM KU’DAMM Berlin includes a minibar and a safe. Free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom. Guests staying at the Lindner enjoy free use of the nearby Clever fit gym. A daily breakfast buffet is provided. Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace. Kurfürstendamm Underground Station is 300 metres away from the Lindner Berlin Ku’damm. The historic Gedächtniskirche Church is 400 metres away.

name: Classik Hotel Alexander Plaza
description: A 5-minute walk from Berlin’s Alexanderplatz Square and the lively Hackescher Markt area, this hotel offers a sauna area, massage services and free WiFi. Classik Hotel Alexander Plaza’s bright rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows, and a red and grey colour scheme. Comforts include flat-screen TVs and minibars. A breakfast buffet is served in the bright conservatory. Guests can enjoy drinks in the bar area. The sauna and fitness area was renovated in 2017 and is decorated in warm earth colours. A 5-minute walk takes you to Museum Island, Hackescher Markt S-Bahn Station and the Spandauer Str./Marienkirche Bus Stop. There are direct connections to Berlin Brandenburg International Airport (BER) from the hotel. Paid private parking is available in the on-site garage.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street, this Hampton by Hilton hotel in Berlin's Charlottenburg district offers air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi and free use of the modern gym. Every room at the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West features a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee facilities, and a bathroom with glass shower. Many rooms have a terrace overlooking the city. A buffet breakfast is provided each morning at the Hampton Berlin. Hot drinks and light meals are available in the Hampton by Hilton’s 24-hour snack area. The Hilton Berlin City West’s 24-hour business area offers a library, 3 internet terminals and a printer which can be used free of charge. Uhlandstraße Underground Station is just 400 metres from the Hampton by Hilton. Trains run to the famous KaDeWe department store in 3 minutes.

name: Hotel The Yard
description: Hotel the YARD is set in the vibrant Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg district of Berlin, a 15-minute walk from Checkpoint Charlie. The hotel features contemporary design with the rooms facing a green inner courtyard. Rooms are equipped with high-grade materials, high ceilings, light-filled interiors, real wooden parquet floors and individual temperature control. Hotel the YARD is located near the Bergmannstraße with its fine restaurants, cosy cafés and alternative bookstores. It is also near the multicultural restaurants and trendy clubs of the Oranienstraße. Hallesches Tor Underground Station is a 5-minute walk from Hotel the YARD, providing quick connections to Friedrichstraße and all main attractions in central Berlin.

name: Hotel Indigo Berlin - KU'Damm
description: The Hotel Indigo® Berlin Ku’damm hotel, just opposite the University of the Arts, blends beautifully with our busy cultural district. Inspired by the light and atmosphere of a neighborhood artist’s studio, our rooms and lobby are designed in a bright, modern style that forms a strong connection with the area. The artistic theme continues in each room, with neighborhood-inspired murals and stylish furniture. Our restaurant and bar offer locally sourced ingredients and an extensive drink menu, while our lobby tips its hat to the city’s booming modern art scene found right outside.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Michelberger Hotel
description: Modern rooms with imaginative design, free Wi-Fi and a stylish café-bar are featured at this unique hotel in Berlin’s lively Friedrichshain district, just 500 metres from the O2 World Arena. The Michelberger Hotel ‘s individually furnished rooms feature artistic décor and cable TV. Each has a private bathroom with shower. The restaurant serves healthy, organic meals, made with fresh local ingredients. Vegan and vegetarian options are available. Guests can relax with a drink and a book in the café-bar, and there are often live music events in the evenings. The famous East Side Gallery is a 5-minute walk from the Michelberger, and Berlin’s Kreuzberg district is a 10-minute walk away. Warschauer Straße S-Bahn (city rail) and underground station is opposite the hotel. From here, Alexanderplatz Square is 3 stops away and Berlin Main Station is 6 stops away.

name: Dorint Kurfürstendamm Berlin
description: With a stay at Dorint Kurfürstendamm Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Kurfürstendamm and 9 minutes by foot from Berlin Zoological Garden. Life Style hotel is 0.3 mi (0.4 km) from Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and 0.3 mi (0.5 km) from Theatre of the West. Make yourself at home in one of the 311 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club and a sauna. For lunch or dinner, stop by Restaurant Le Faubourg, a restaurant that specializes in French cuisine. Dining is also available and 24-hour room service is provided. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 11 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 23681 square feet (2200 square meters), including 16 meeting rooms.Expedia

name: The Mandala Suites
description: Stylish rooms, luxury spa facilities and excellent views of Berlin are offered at the Mandala Suites. They are centrally located on Friedrichstrasse Shopping Street, just a 3-minute walk from the pretty Gendarmenmarkt Square. The spacious Mandala Suites feature elegant décor and modern amenities, including a fully equipped kitchenette, cable TV and air conditioning. High-quality toiletries and bathrobes are provided in the marble bathrooms. Guests can enjoy a long breakfast every morning in the Mandala’s lounge on the 8th floor, which offers views of Berlin’s rooftops. Spa facilities include a sauna, gym and steam room. Relaxing massages and cosmetic treatments can be booked here. Checkpoint Charlie and the famous Unter den Linden Boulevard are just a 10-minute walk from the suites. Stadtmitte Underground Station is a 2-minute walk away, providing excellent public transport connections to all parts of Berlin.

name: Melia Berlin
description: Offering an exclusive Executive club and spacious rooms, this stylish hotel stands beside the River Spree on Berlin’s Friedrichstraße shopping street. Free and unlimited high-speed WiFi is featured throughout the property. The bright rooms and suites at the non-smoking Meliá Berlin include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows, and a bathroom with heated floors. Spa facilities at the Meliá Berlin include a modern gym and sauna. Rental bicycles are provided on request. A rich buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Guests can also sample Mediterranean specialities and tapas in the bar. The Brandenburg Gate and many other famous sites are within 1 km of the Meliá Berlin. Friedrichstraße Train Station is just 100 metres away, providing great underground, city rail, and tram links to all parts of Berlin.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Berlin
description: The Movenpick Hotel Berlin impresses with its central location in the immediate vicinity of Potsdamer Platz. In the middle of the city, the hotel not only offers an oasis of 243 stylish rooms, but also a green courtyard for guests to relax. The restaurant constantly reinterprets classics of Swiss cuisine. If you are looking for action in addition to leisure, you will be thrilled by the in-house fitness area with sauna or you can rent a bike to explore.accorhotels.com

name: Hollywood Media Hotel
description: This Hollywood-themed hotel features a free spa and soundproofed rooms in the heart of Berlin, directly on the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. It is a 5-minute walk from Uhlandstraße underground station. The 4-star Hollywood Media Hotel am Kurfürstendamm offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and minibar. All rooms feature a biography and poster of a Hollywood star or director. The Cleopatra sauna area features a Finnish sauna and steam room, and massages can be booked. Guests can also use the the small gym. A rich breakfast buffet is served in the Bel Air breakfast restaurant. Guests can enjoy snacks and exotic cocktails in the stylish Callas Bar, and there are 2 partner restaurants within the complex. The hotel is close to many shops and restaurants, and Berlin Zoo and the popular Savignyplatz Square are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Novotel Suites Berlin City Potsdamer Platz
description: The 3-star Novotel Suites Berlin City Potsdamer Platz hotel invites you to enjoy a relaxing stay in Berlin in our 323-sq.ft. (30-m²) suites. The Suites are equipped with kitchenette, double bed and extra bed, shower, bathtub and separate toilet. Start the day with our extensive buffet breakfast and put the day to bed at the hotel bar. Every Thursday, you will receive a complimentary ten-minute massage.accorhotels.com

name: The Mandala Hotel
description: This 5-star design hotel in central Berlin offers stylish studios and suites with kitchen facilities. It is located opposite the Sony Center in Potsdamer Platz and features an elegant spa, free WiFi and a double Michelin-star restaurant. Mandala Hotel’s non-smoking rooms and suites offer views of the courtyard or the modern buildings at Potsdamer Platz. They are all located on the quiet upper floors of the building and feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and luxury linen and bedding. The modern ONO wellness area includes a fitness lounge. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The FACIL restaurant is listed in Gault Millau, and has now also just been awarded 2 Michelin stars for 2016. It offers a daily breakfast and a range of gourmet evening meals. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in the QIU Restaurant & Bar, or outside on the summer terrace. Brandenburg Gate is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, and Potsdamer Platz Station is just 100 metres away.

name: Mondrian Suites Berlin Checkpoint Charlie
description: Located at the famous Checkpoint Charlie monument in central Berlin, this accommodation offers modern studios and apartments in varying sizes.The Jewish Museum and Friedrichstraße shopping street can both be reached within 5 minutes on foot. All units at Mondrian Suites Berlin am Checkpoint Charlie include a balcony or terrace and face the courtyard. Other facilities include a flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, a laptop safe, wooden flooring, a refrigerator, a microwave oven, a dishwasher, and a Nespresso coffee machine. Guests can also enjoy complimentary Molten Brown toiletries and a USB port. Additionally, the front desk is open 24-hours a day. The property is surrounded by international cafés and restaurants. Offering a bike rental service, the property is ideal for guests looking to explore the city. Berlin’s Brandenburg Gate is easily reachable by foot. Mondrian Suites Berlin am Checkpoint Charlie is set just a 2-minute walk from Kochstraße Underground Station.

name: June Six Hotel Berlin City West
description: This hotel is situated in Berlin’s elegant Charlottenburg district, 50 metres from Savignyplatz Square. June Six Hotel Berlin City West offers free Wi-Fi and contemporary-style rooms with a flat-screen smart TV with satellite channels. Hotel June Six Hotel Berlin City West features a modern glass façade and minimalist rooms with stylish wooden floors. All rooms are air-conditioned and include a work desk and private bathroom. A full breakfast buffet is served each morning at the June Six Hotel Berlin City West. This hotel has its own restaurant and bar. Many cafés and restaurants can be found around Savignyplatz Square. Savignyplatz S-Bahn Train Station is just 250 metres away. This offers direct connections to Berlin Main Station, the Hackescher Markt entertainment district and Alexanderplatz Square. The Kurfüstendamm shopping street is a 3-minute walk from June Six Hotel Berlin City West. It is a 10-minute walk from Berlin Zoo and a 15-minute walk from the world-famous KaDeWe department store. The hotel can arrange a hire car on request.

name: Mercure Hotel & Residenz Berlin Checkpoint Charlie
description: It's just a short walk from the chic shops and bustling life of Friedrichstrasse and the Gendarmenmarkt - and yet, as a guest of the 4-star Mercure Hotel & Residenz Berlin Checkpoint Charlie, you will have a quiet and comfortable stay. Our spacious 117 rooms have air conditioning and free WiFi, many rooms have balconies or terraces facing the green courtyard.accorhotels.com

name: Ameron Hotel Abion Spreebogen Berlin
description: The modern business hotel is set in an historical dairy building, renovated and transformed into a first class hotel, overlooking river "Spree".224 rooms are comfortable and invitingly furnished. The rooms of deluxe and waterside category offer added amenities such as a coffee and tea facility and an in-room safe plus a wonderful view over the river "Spree". All public areas and rooms are non smoking. Delicious and healthy Breakfast is served in Restaurant Alte Meierei. For lunch and dinner Carl & Sophie Restaurant & Bar welcomes you with a great variety of delicate food and selected cocktails.ABION Hotel offers convention and banqueting facilities of 5 conference rooms, all of them flooded by daylight, airconditioned and equipped with modern technique. WiFi is available free of charge in the entire Hotel.After a strenuous day you can enjoy the peace an quietness of the fitness and sauna facilities with modern training equipment, finnish sauna, steam bath and sunbed. The new fitness room on the 9th floor offers you an amazing view over the city! Joggingtrails lead you to our central park "Tiergarten", just a few steps away.iHotelier/iStay

name: Essential By Dorint Berlin-Adlershof
description: This non-smoking hotel in Berlin’s Adlershof district has a bar and a private car park. BER Berlin-Brandenburg Airport can be reached by bus 164, local train S45 or taxi in 15 minutes. All of the air-conditioned rooms at the Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof include satellite TV, a desk and a bathroom with hairdryer. Wi-Fi is available for free. A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof. International meals are served in the elf99 restaurant. The Dorint’s bar offers a range of cocktails, beers and snacks. The Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof is situated in the WISTA science and technology park. Adlershof S-Bahn Station is a 5-minute walk away, providing direct access to the city centre.

name: Novotel Berlin Mitte
description: The Novotel Berlin is a place for business travelers and families alike. Business travelers benefit from 6 meeting rooms, as well as from work areas and free WIFI in the rooms. For families, we offer 186 family rooms and a play area for our younger guests. Relax in the fitness area with sauna and in the evening at the hotel bar. This 4-star hotel in Berlin's Mitte district is located on Fischerinsel, within walking distance of Museum Island. Shopping facilities and many sights are nearby.accorhotels.com

name: The Social Hub Berlin
description: Well set in Berlin, The Social Hub Berlin Alexanderplatz provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy international dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. All units include a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near The Social Hub Berlin Alexanderplatz include Alexanderplatz Underground Station, Alexanderplatz and Berlin Cathedral. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: This 4-star Superior hotel features a top-floor sauna and fitness area, and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It stands in Berlin's Mitte district, a 15-minute walk from Alexanderplatz. The rooms at the Leonardo Royal Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz feature large windows and bright décor. Each room has hot drinks facilities and a flat-screen TV with Sky channels. A buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the Vitruv restaurant. Tram and bus services stop directly outside the Leonardo. The pretty Volkspark Friedrichshain Park is a few steps away.

name: Hotel Adlon Kempinski Berlin
description: The quintessence of luxury lodging, the Adlon is a legendary 5-star hotel situated in Berlin’s Mitte, beside the Brandenburg Gate. State-of-the-art facilities include a double Michelin-star restaurant and a shopping arcade. With such a central location, the Hotel Adlon Kempinski allows direct access to some of Berlin’s main landmarks. The Holocaust Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie and Pariser Platz are all within a 10-minute walk. Rooms have a sophisticated allure thanks to antique furnishings with extravagant twists and marble bathrooms. They are equipped with WiFi, a modern media system and some offer views of the Brandenburg Gate. Sporting and relaxing amenities include a neoclassical indoor pool, an 800m² gym, and a spa with Ayurveda treatments. Wild game specialtities and private dining are all available options.

name: Monbijou Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from Berlin’s lively Hackescher Markt square, this boutique hotel features a fitness centre, rental bikes and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. Museum Island is only 400 metres away. Decorated in a vintage British style, the rooms offer large windows and wooden floors. Comforts include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a private bathroom. Monbijou Hotel offers a restaurant and bistro, and drinks can be enjoyed at the bar. You can also relax with a book in the Monbijou’s library area. A large variety of cafés, bars and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of Hotel Monbijou. Hackescher Markt S-Bahn Train Station is 150 metres away, providing a connection to Alexanderplatz and the Friedrichstraße shopping street.

name: Holiday Inn Berlin - City East Side
description: Holiday Inn® Berlin - City East Side hotel is steps from the River Spree and a Berlin Wall remnant preserved as a monument and outdoor gallery. From nearby Warschauer Strasse station, the U- and S-Bahn networks provide speedy links to popular East Berlin attractions, such as the GDR-era TV Tower in Alexanderplatz. It’s a 25-minute journey to the imposing Brandenburg Gate and the cultural riches of Museum Island. The airport Berlin-Brandenburg (BER) are 30 minutes away by car. Our family-friendly hotel is next to the Mercedes-Benz Arena, which presents major pop concerts and sporting events. Business guests can host conferences for up to 70 people in our flexible event spaces, while companies such as Zalando, Daimler and Coca-Cola are all within walking distance.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Inclusive Wi-Fi- A mini-gym- Underground parking at a daily rate- Kids Stay and Eat FreeOur welcoming Open Lobby is a multipurpose space where you can relax with a cocktail or a Alfredo coffee, meet colleagues and friends for a meal, or check your emails. Our comfortable, streamlined rooms are decorated in soothing colours. As well as high-quality bedding, they feature pillow menus and blackout blinds to ensure you get a restful night’s sleep.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Pullman Berlin Schweizerhof
description: Pullman Berlin Schweizerhof is in Berlins City West, an excellent location close to Kurfuerstendamm and the Zoological Garden. A zoo inspired motif in the form of a larger than life giraffe welcomes you in the lobby. This modern hotel decorated in an elegant Bauhaus style offers 377 rooms and suites with AC and high speed WIFI, as well as BLEND berlin kitchen and bar and the stylish Fit and Spa lounge incl. our popular indoor pool.accorhotels.com

name: The Ritz-Carlton Berlin
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Berlin is located in the heart of the city at Potsdamer Platz, neighboring Berlin’s largest inner city park “Tiergarten” and situated just a 7 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate. This superior 5-star hotel has won multiple awards and offers a unique setting in an contemporary style and the highest level of outstanding service. Richly designed and residential in feel, the 303 guest rooms and suites combine exquisite Art Deco design with contemporary touches and hand-selected furnishings recapture the essence of Berlin’s glamorous golden era. Guest can savor a variety of culinary experiences: POTS represents the modern German cuisine, while the elegant The Lounge pampers guests with quality teas and its own menu. The Curtain Club is one of the city's top bars and complete the culinary ensemble the luxury hotel has to offer. To relax and unwind, an elegant wellness facility and the exclusive Club Lounge on the 10th floor welcome guests.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Berlin
description: Waldorf Astoria Berlin welcomes you with modern luxury and unparalleled Waldorf Service. Located in the heart of the prestigious neighbourhoods of Berlin City West, by the luxury shopping district of Kurfürstendamm, this Berlin hotel offers an array of world-famous landmarks and activities to discover within simple walking distance or by the efficient S and U-Bahn transport systems.  Admire incredible panoramic views of the Berlin skyline from every Guest Room, Suite and Apartment in the first luxury hotel in this part of the city. Inspired by the original Waldorf Astoria design, Art Deco features are merged seamlessly with elements of modernity to create a totally unique hotel interior.  Expect the best at our luxury Berlin hotel, including all-day dining at restaurant ROCA, signature drinks and light snacks at 1920s-themed Lang Bar, afternoon tea at the renowned Peacock Alley and high tea at Library Lounge.  Discover serene rejuvenation in the first Guerlain Spa in Germany featuring a wide range of soothing body, face, and massage treatments, an indoor pool, thermal zone and the latest fitness equipment.  For a distinctive event, conference or celebration, consider our versatile second-floor spaces, including a 330 square meter ballroom. The terrace has room for up to 200 guests - its sixth-floor vantage provides views over the rooftops of Berlin. Epic vistas and sophisticated ambience are constant companions at this luxury hotel. Stay and enjoy or stroll over to Kurfuerstendamm, Berlin's legendary shopping boulevard.Official Hotel Information

name: Rocco Forte Hotel De Rome
description: This 5-star hotel on Berlin’s Bebelplatz Square offers gourmet cuisine and a luxury spa. The historic Unter den Linden Boulevard is 150 metres away. The elegant and soundproofed rooms at the Rocco Forte Hotel de Rome feature high ceilings and high-speed internet. The marble bathrooms include heated mosaic floors and a bidet. The CHIARO restaurant serves à la carte authentic italian specialties. There also a 5th-floor rooftop terrace with panoramic views over the Bebelplatz and central Berlin. Guests are welcome to enjoy afternoon tea in the Opera Court with its original stucco ceiling. Drinks are served in the Velvet Room or in the Bebel Bar, which overlooks Bebelplatz and Berlin’s Staatsoper Opera House.

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Mitte
address: Platz Vor Dem Neuen Tor 6, 10115 Berlin
description: Featuring a swimming pool and a sauna, Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Mitte is situated in Berlin and provides modern accommodation. This stylish property is set in the heart of the city. Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Mitte offers free Wi-Fi and private parking on site. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. All apartments are air conditioned and boast their very own seating and dining area. They feature a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Mitte features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. The property is under a 20-minute drive from Berlin Tegel Airport and Oranienburger Strasse is a brief stroll away. The Friedrichstadt-Palast and Berlin Hauptbahnhof Railway Station are within walking distance.Revato

name: Capri by Fraser Berlin
description: These serviced studios are located near the river Spree in the heart of the central Mitte district of Berlin. Capri by Fraser offers a 24-hour reception, free high-speed WiFi and an on-site bar. Newly opened in May 2017, each studio features modern furnishings as well as a washing machine, exclusive toiletries and either a bathtub or rain shower. They also offer a desk, media hub with iPod dock, a Smart TV, a room safe, bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Some feature a kitchenette upon request. The accommodation is less than a 10-minute walk from the historic Nikolai district, the world-famous Unter den Linden boulevard and the majestic Gendarmenmarkt square. Capri by Fraser Berlin is less than a 5-minute walk from Spittelmarkt Underground Station and there are nearby bus connections to all parts of the German capital.

name: Living Hotel Weißensee
description: This hotel offers a peaceful park setting in Berlin’s Weißensee district, a direct tram ride from Alexanderplatz. It features modern rooms with free minibar, and a restaurant with beer garden. The air-conditioned rooms at Livinghotel Weißensee include satellite TV. Some have a balcony, microwave and kettle, and selected drinks in the minibar are free. Living Hotel Weißensee features a modern fitness centre with gym, sauna and infra-red sauna. Bathrobes and towels are provided. The hotel's restaurant serves hearty German dishes, and a buffet breakfast can be booked. Guests can enjoy drinks in the cocktail bar or outside in the beer garden. The Albertinenstraße tram stop is a 10-minute walk away. From here, trams run to the famous Berlin TV Tower at Alexanderplatz in 15 minutes.

name: Myer's Hotel Berlin
description: This 4-star boutique hotel is in a historic building in the trendy Prenzlauer Berg district of Berlin, within 10 or 15 minutes of the city centre by public transport. It offers classical-style rooms, original works of art, and great transport connections. The rooms and suites of the Myer's Hotel Berlin feature high ceilings, fine wood, and paintings. All rooms also include manually adjustable air conditioning. Pictures by local artists are displayed in Myer's Hotel Berlin's courtyard. A big breakfast buffet is available in the hotel's Gelber Salon.Guests can also relax in the tea room, lobby bar, and conservatory. The Senefelder Platz Underground Station is only a 3-minute walk from Myer's Hotel. The famous Alexanderplatz square is just 1 stop away. Direct trains run to the Kurfürstendamm shopping street within 20 minutes. There is a small spa area with a dry sauna, steam sauna and ultrared cabin in the cellar vault of the historic building. This can be used free of charge by hotel guests between 16:00 and 22:30. Bathrobes are available at reception, and massages can also be booked for a surcharge. Guests also receive discounted daily admission at a 24-hour fitness centre around the corner.

name: Hotel Q
description: Elegant rooms and studios with a unique design are offered at this design hotel, located on Berlin’s famous Kurfürstendamm shopping mile. Free Wi-Fi is offered. The air-conditioned rooms and studios at the Hotel Q! Berlin feature a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Newspapers are displayed every day, and a laptop is available for guests' use. You can relax in the modern spa area with a Japanese wash zone, a Finnish sauna, a steam bath and a sand relaxation room with underfloor heating. A range of massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. Our wellness area is open daily from 6:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. The Hotel Q!'s rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. Guests can enjoy healthy and contemporary Thai dishes in the restaurant, or relax with a cocktail at the fireplace in the stylish Fox Bar or else in the summer outside on the terrace or the green inner courtyard of the Fox Garden. Uhlandstrasse Underground Station and Savignyplatz S-Bahn Train Station are less than a 5-minute walk away.

name: Mercure Hotel Moa Berlin
description: With a 1,600 sqm green atrium, 4-star Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin is in the heart of the capital. 336 rooms with free WIFI and flat screen TV. Centrally located in the Tiergarten district, with very good local and long-distance transport connections. The Reichstag, government district, main railway station and Airport Berlin Brandenburg are within easy reach. Convenient parking in our car park fee.accorhotels.com

name: Seminaris Campushotel Berlin
description: We love Berlin because it is always excitingly different. But as much as we like to see what is happening in the city, the more we appreciate a cozy nest, into which we can retreat after an hour long day. In our 186 rooms you will find just such a place where you can recharge your batteries for new deeds. And through the floor-to-ceiling window fronts you always have the view of the city.If you want go for a city tour, you should nourish your body particularly well. We pamper you at the Seminaris CampusHotel Berlin with the best cuisine: from breakfast to lunch and dinner at the restaurant Papillon to a nightcap at the bar Faculty Club, we spoil your taste buds with culinary delights, fresh and surprising. On our terrace you can experience it all outside in warm temperatures. Due to its unique location on the campus of Freie Universitt Berlin, the Seminaris CampusHotel breathes a lot of knowledge and innovative spirit. The ideal place to initiate change processes on a solid foundation conventionally or with the living methods of the world of New Work and to create ideas and concepts together. A creative environment with separate Conferene Center with 15 meeting rooms, break-out facilities, conference hall as well as separable group work rooms and flexible co-working spaces for business in between.You can feel the big city fever in our modern fitness area.You will be also amazed how much nature you can discover around the hotel, because we are very close to the Botanical Garden and the Grunewald with its famous hunting lodge. And just a stone's throw away, you are in the middle of the city west with must-sees such as the Kurfrstendamm and Brandenburg Gate, but also in business mode with the Berlin Messe and the City Cube. Just 300 m from the hotel you will find the underground station Dahlem-Dorf.iHotelier/iStay

name: H10 Berlin Ku'damm
description: The hotel offers modern accommodation in Berlin and is a short stroll from Berlin Zoologischer Garten Railway Station. It also provides free Wi-Fi and a sauna. This stylish hotel offers a range of facilities, including a coffee bar, massage services and an executive floor. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend places to visit and provide other tourist information. After a day of discovering the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Salt&Pepper, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Berlin's attractions, including Theater des Westens and Kurfurstendamm, are within a 10-minute walk of H10 Berlin Ku'Damm. The local neighbourhood is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Regent Berlin
description: At Regent Berlin, history and luxury meet to offer an unforgettable experience in the heart of Berlin. Admire the beauty of Gendarmenmarkt, one of the most picturesque squares in Europe. Indulge in delicious cuisine at Charlotte & Fritz, where culinary excellence meets exceptional hospitality at the highest level. With world-class personalized service, Regent Berlin is the ultimate choice for your stay in this vibrant city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Hackescher Markt
description: Situated in the city centre, Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Hackescher Markt offers easy access to Berlin's popular retail and sightseeing areas. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, a sauna and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of facilities available to guests of Adina, such as limited hours room service, a laundry service and bicycle rental. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. All apartments are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a dishwasher and a mini bar. They each offer a seating area, a kitchenette and an in-room dining area. Adina Apartment Hotel Berlin Hackescher Markt houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood features several bars and restaurants with a range of varied cuisines. Berlin's attractions, such as the Neues Museum and Park Inn Berlin, are within easy walking distance of Adina. The property is also located near the area's popular establishments, plus Alexanderplatz and Oranienburger Strasse are within walking distance.Revato

name: Mercure Hotel Berlin Tempelhof
description: The Mercure Berlin Tempelhof in the trendy Kreuzkölln neighborhood is ideal for leisure and business guests. Start off the day in our fitness center or refuel at the generous breakfast buffet. Our large meeting area offers the perfect environment for meetings and training events, while our restaurant and hotel bar are the ideal place to take stock of your day before returning to your spacious room.accorhotels.com

name: Aspria Berlin Ku’damm
description: A unique hotel, spa and sporting club awaits. Located just off Berlin's Kudamm, Asprias hotel and club blends the comfort of a contemporary city hotel with the most extensive sports and wellness offering, creating an exceptional experience. All overnight guests are designated resident members of Aspria Berlin Ku'damm, and can enjoy exclusive access to: Restaurant and bar, Swimming pools Spa, Massages and Treatments, State-of-the-art fitness facilities, Fitness and aqua classes.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quentin XL Potsdamer Platz
description: Newly opened in 2018, this modern hotel in central Berlin is within a 5-10 minute walk from the Potsdamer Platz square. It offers bright, stylish rooms and very good transport connections. Quentin XL Potsdamer Platz hotel is a short walking distance from the popular shopping, business and tourist attractions district surrounding Potsdamer Platz square. A bus stop is in front of the hotel. Underground and S-Bahn train links just a 5-minute walk from the hotel help you explore the rest of the city. Featuring elegant modern furnishings throughout, all air-conditioned rooms come with a Smart LED TV and a private bathroom fitted with a rain shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in all rooms and public areas. A breakfast buffet is served each morning. Berlin Tegel Airport is 8 km from Quentin XL Potsdamer Platz. Schönefeld Airport is 24 km away.

name: Airporthotel Berlin Adlershof
description: This hotel in Berlin-Adlershof offers well-equipped rooms and a daily breakfast buffet. It is located in the WISTA Science & Technology Park, just a 10-minute train ride from Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER). The rooms at the 3-star Airporthotel Berlin-Adlershof include floor-to-ceiling windows, a modern bathroom and Wi-Fi internet access. The Airporthotel offers a large breakfast buffet each morning, which includes a range of organic products. In the evenings, a variety of drinks are served at the hotel bar. The Adlershof S-Bahn (city rail) station is just 400 metres from the Airporthotel Berlin-Adlershof, providing a direct link to Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER) and Berlin Hauptbahnhof (main railway station).

name: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre, An IHG Hotel
description: A business hotel in Berlin city centre with a spa and conference facilities. Crowne Plaza® Berlin - City Ctr Nurnberger Ku'damm hotel is just off the famous Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Nearby U-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten or Wittenbergplatz provide access to Berlin Central Station or the iconic Brandenburg Gate in less than 15 minutes. Our 13 meeting rooms include private boardrooms and a conference centre for 1,000 guests. If you’re hosting an event, the Crowne Plaza Meetings Director can help arrange everything including catering. Delegates travelling by air can be at Berlin Airport (BER) in 40-60 minutes. Take a break at Berlin Zoo or the Haus der Kulturen der Welt arts centre in nearby Tiergarten park, also home to a lakeside beer garden. Ask the concierge for advice on local jogging routes. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Inclusive Wi-Fi as well as Indoor - outdoor parking for a daily fee Our Sleep Advantage® programme offers premium bedding and Quiet Zones for a good night’s sleep. Stay on your toes with a workout at the gym or a few laps in the indoor pool, book a treatment at the spa or wind down in the sauna. The Wilson’s Restaurant (closed until further notice) serves a classic American menu, with terrace dining in good weather. You can meet colleagues for a drink at Kemmons Bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Eurostars Berlin
description: A top-floor spa area, free Wi-Fi, and fine international cuisine are offered by this luxury hotel. It stands on Berlin’s historic Friedrichstraße shopping street. Eurostars Berlin provides stylish rooms and suites with flat-screen TV, tea/coffee maker, and elegant wooden flooring. All bathrooms feature select bathroom products. A modern gym and sauna can be found in the Eurostars’ spa area. Creative, international cuisine is served in the Berlin Eurostars’ à la carte restaurant. A full buffet breakfast starts each day. Friedrichstraße Underground and S-Bahn Train Station is just 250 metres from the Eurostars. Guests can use the Eurostars Hotel's underground garage on request.

name: Novotel Berlin am Tiergarten
description: Our 4-star hotel caters to both families and business travelers. Our 274 rooms come with work areas. Guests can relax in the wellness and fitness area or on the rooftop terrace. The play area for kids features a digital gaming table, coloring books and more. Our central location is within easy reach of Tiergarten, Brandenburg Gate and the trade fair.accorhotels.com

name: Titanic Chaussee Berlin
description: Titanic Chaussee Berlin is located in the heart of Berlin close to main station and just a few minutes from the modern art museum Hamburger Bahnhof. The hotel puts you right on the edge of Berlin’s most creative neighbourhood full of vibrant culture, cutting-edge architecture, fabulous food, intense parties and tangible history. Just a stroll away the area between Hackerscher Markt, Berlin Wall Memorial and Torstraße are buzzing with pure lifestyle fabulous boutiques and great art galleries.Official Hotel Information

name: acom-Hotel Berlin-City South
description: acom Hotel Berlin City SouthModern business-hotel Easy access to the airport, shopping and entertainment precincts (Gropius Passagen) 30 minutes drive to the city center 56 comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and including a bottle of mineralwater per stay Early check-in 11 am upon availability Late check out 14 pm upon availabilityiHotelier/iStay

name: Grand Hyatt Berlin
description: This 5-star hotel has a large rooftop spa and pool with spectacular views of Berlin. Located in the lively Potsdamer Platz district, 300 metres from the Sony Center, it also offers stylish restaurants and bars. Grand Hyatt Berlin’s elegant rooms and suites feature 55-inch TVs and hot drinks facilities. The marble bathrooms include flat-screen TVs, and free WiFi. All guests receive a free bottle of mineral water. All guests at the hotel enjoy free access to the Club Olympus Spa & Fitness, which offers great views of the Berlin skyline. Facilities include a pool, spa pool and modern gym, as well as various saunas. Massages and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. International, Asian and seasonal cuisine is served in the Vox Restaurant. During summer months, guests can dine on the Grand Hyatt’s terrace. The Berlin Philharmonic Hall and Tiergarten Park are a 5-minute walk away. The Brandenburg Gate can be reached on foot in less than 15 minutes.

name: Leonardo Hotel Berlin Mitte
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Berlin,100 metres from Friedrichstraße Train Station. Leonardo Hotel Berlin Mitte offers free WiFi. All rooms at Leonardo Hotel Berlin Mitte are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV as well as a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of central Berlin. At Leonardo Hotel Berlin Mitte you will find a fitness centre. It also offers meeting facilities and luggage storage. The hotel is 30 metres from the Friedrichstadtpalast Theatre. Leonardo Hotel Berlin Mitte is 800 metres from The Brandenburg Gate, 900 metres from the Natural History Museum and 900 metres from the German Historical Museum.

name: NH Berlin Kurfürstendamm
description: The 4-star NH Berlin Kurfürstendamm is only a short walk away from one of Berlin’s main shopping streets and is well connected to the entire city. With a privileged location in Charlottenburg, guests can visit the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church, Charlottenburg Castle and Berlin Zoo on foot. For Berlin’s Main Station and the ICC Exhibition center, take a direct train from the Uhlandstrasse metro stop. To enjoy stylish bars and restaurants head to the nearby Savignyplatz Square. NH Berlin Kurfürstendamm is the definition of classic meets contemporary. The spacious rooms are designed in a neutral color palette, and feature comfortable mattresses, flat-screen TVs, tea and coffee makers, as well as free Wi-Fi. For a little more luxury, guests staying in the Suite will have access to a large private terrace. In the morning, enjoy a large spread for breakfast with hot dishes made to order, accompanied by hot and cold beverages. Throughout the day guests can order drinks and snacks from the Van Gogh bar. For convenience, there is also a 24/7 Open Bar.NH Hoteles

name: Arcotel John F Berlin
description: Centrally located just a 5-minute walk from Museum Island and 300 metres from Berlin’s famous Unter den Linden Boulevard, this 4-star hotel offers rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Elegant rooms with high-quality furniture, a DVD player and rocking chair are offered at ARCOTEL John F. The Foreign Affairs restaurant serves gourmet international cuisine, and a rich buffet or small continental breakfast is available each morning. Beers, wines and cocktails can be enjoyed in the stylish Town Bar. John F lies just 500 metres from Gendarmenmarkt Square and the Deutsches Historisches Museum, and is a 20-minute walk from the Brandenburg Gate. The spa and gym on the 6th floor of the ARCOTEL John F overlooks the peaceful green courtyard. It features a Finnish sauna, Infrarot sauna and relaxation area. Hausvogteiplatz Underground Station on the U2 line is just 300 metres away, and provides a connection to Alexanderplatz Square in just 6 minutes.

name: Citadines Kurfürstendamm Berlin
description: This aparthotel offers soundproofed apartments with free WiFi and fully equipped kitchens.
