It is a 2-minute walk from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street and a 5-minute walk from Adenauerplatz underground station. All apartments and studios at the superior Citadines Berlin Kurfürstendamm Aparthotel include air conditioning, safe and CD player. The kitchen provides cooking facilities and a dishwasher. Reception is open 24 hours a day at the Citadines Berlin Kurfürstendamm Aparthotel. A laundry room and a private garage are available for guests. The Citadines apartments are on a quiet side road, opposite a supermarket. Underground trains and buses run directly to Tegel Airport and the ICC exhibition centre.

name: Hotel Müggelsee Berlin
description: Herzlich Willkommen in unserer Mggelseeperle im grnen Kpenicker Forst direkt am Ufer des Mggelsees. Nur wenige Hotels in Berlin sind so vielfltig und bieten Ihnen so umfangreiche Mglichkeiten wie unsere Mggelperle. Am Ufer des grten und schnsten Sees der Hauptstadt gelegen, bieten wir Ihnen zahlreiche Perspektiven der Freizeitgestaltung. Reicht das alles nicht - sind Sie schnell in der Berliner Innenstadt.Ob Ihre Familienfeier, Ihr Firmenevent, Ihre Tagung oder ein erholsamer Urlaub in Berlin - genieen Sie die Behaglichkeit der Mggelseeperle und die wohltuende Natur, die uns umgibt.Sie wohnen, feiern und tagen inmitten traumhafter Natur. Neben unseren Gsten liegt uns insbesondere die Natur am Herzen. Daher engagieren wir uns fr umweltfreundliches Leben und Arbeiten.Wir sind bestrebt Nachhaltigkeit in unser tgliches Arbeiten und Handeln zu integrieren und versuchen wo immer mglich, Ihnen vor allem regionale Produkte anzubieten. So vermeiden wir, gemeinsam mit vielen engagierten Zulieferern, eine Menge Emission. Welcome to our Mggelseeperle in the green Kpenicker Forest directly on the shore of the Mggelsee.Only a few hotels in Berlin are as varied and offer you such extensive possibilities as our Mggelperle.Located on the shore of the largest and most beautiful lake in the capital, we offer you numerous perspectives for leisure activities. If all that is not enough - you are quickly in the center of Berlin.Whether your family celebration, your company event, your conference or a relaxing holiday in Berlin - enjoy the comfort of the Mggelseeperle and the soothing nature that surrounds us.You live, celebrate and meet in the midst of beautiful nature. In addition to our guests, nature is particularly important to us. Therefore, we are committed to environmentally friendly living and working.We strive to integrate sustainability into our daily work and actions and try wherever possible to offer you primarily regional products. In this way, together with many committed suppliers, we avoid a lot of emissions.iHotelier/iStay

name: Two Hotel Berlin By Axel - Adults Only
description: This hotel offers free WiFi as well as a popular lounge. TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel lies in Berlin's gay area, near many leisure, gastronomic and shopping highlights, including the iconic Kurfürstendamm. Opened in January 2017, the TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel provides exquisitely designed rooms and junior suites. All include natural daylight and soundproofing and a bathroom with anti-fogging mirrors as well as a built-in radio. Guests can also adjust the heating, air conditioning and lighting exactly to their taste. Breakfast is available between 07:00 and 11:00 daily. The lounge on the 7th floor is a friendly meeting point for all guests, regardless of sexuality. The hotel is LGBTIQ oriented but hetero-friendly. Guests can work out for free at the Fitness by TWO Hotel Berlin 24 hours a day. The hotel is a 3-minute walk from Güntzelstrasse Underground Station and a 5-minute walk from Berliner Straße Underground Station, and most of Berlin's main attractions can be reached within a 10-minute drive by car. The TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel is 5 km from the Messe Berlin exhibition centre, 12 km from Tegel Airport and 21 km from Schönefeld Airport.

name: Townhouse Berlin
description: Offering soundproofed apartments with free WiFi and daily breakfast, this hotel in the elegant Charlottenburg district of Berlin is a 5-minute walk from the Zoologischer Garten Train Station. Each 1-room studio at the Townhouse Berlin has its own style and color scheme. All studios feature a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV, and a spa shower. Direct trains run from Zoologischer Garten to the famous Alexanderplatz Square in just 12 minutes. The ICC Messe Exhibition Centre is 20 minutes away by car. In the mornings, guests can have breakfast in the Townhouse Berlin bistro or on the courtyard terrace. Several restaurants are within walking distance. Guests are welcome to use the Townhouse Berlin small fitness room during their stay, all fitness equipment from "Technogym". A children’s playground and rental bicycles are on site.

name: Abion Villa
description: Welcome to the Abion Villa - our exclusive and luxurious hotel in Berlin Mitte / Tiergarten. Due to its unique location on the banks of the river Spree, it is a perfect place for individualists and guests with a sense for art and design.The impressive wave-shaped glass facade of the historic brick building provides a wonderful view on the Spree riverscape in Berlin's city center. Enjoy a restful stay with a maritime feeling in the heart of the Germany's capital!Our unique boutique hotel in Berlin has excellent transport connections to the city centre and major tourist attractions of the town. In 19 rooms and suites, we offer our guests exclusive design and exceptional hospitality. Thus, our Abion Villa is the optimal location for your next business or leisure trip.We look forward to welcoming you soon!iHotelier/iStay

name: Aparthotel Adagio Berlin Kurfürstendamm
description: The Adagio Berlin is situated just minutes from the world-famous Kurfürstendamm in the heart of West Berlin. Ranging from studio apartments for 2 people to two-roomed apartments for 4 people, our 132 apartments are fully equipped, featuring a kitchen, living room, desk etc. On-site facilities include breakfast service, Internet access, a meeting room and a fitness center where you can relax. Welcome home!accorhotels.com
